tidbits.title: Modern Skyline
tidbits.description: Qatar features a modern skyline, with architectural marvels like the futuristic skyline of Doha, including the iconic Museum of Islamic Art.

tidbits.title: Rich Culture
tidbits.description: The country holds onto its rich culture through traditions like falconry, Arabian horses, and a strong emphasis on hospitality.

tidbits.title: Economic Prosperity
tidbits.description: Qatar's prosperity is driven by its oil and gas reserves, allowing for impressive infrastructure development and a high standard of living.
